sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Card, Button, Container, CardDeck } from "react-bootstrap"; import Spain from './../images/spain1.jpg'; import Italy from './../images/rome.jpg'; import Par from './../images/paris.jpg'; import Berlin from './../images/berlin.jpg'; import Turkey from './../images/turkey.jpg'; import USA from './../images/usa.jpg'; class Destinations extends React.Component { render() { return ( France Paris Paris, the capital city of France, is the third most visited city in the world.Paris hosts some of the world's most recognizable landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower. Spain Madrid The nightlife in Spain is very attractive to both tourists and locals. Spain is known to have some of the best nightlife in the world. USA New York City New York City has been described as the cultural, financial, and media capital of the world, significantly influencing commerce, entertainment, research, technology, education, politics, tourism, art, fashion, and sports.

Italy Rome Rome has become increasingly popular as a tourist destination globally.Popular tourists attractions in the city include the Colosseum, St Peter's Basilica, the Pantheon and so on. Turkey Istanbul Istanbul is one of the most important tourism spots not only in Turkey but also in the world. It is world-famous for its rich history and culture, stunning scenery, magnificent structures, and a plethora of aspects. Germany Berlin Berlin has a yearly total of about 135 million day visitors, which puts it in third place among the most-visited city destinations in the European Union. ); } } export default Destinations;
